name: The Lesser of Two Equals
description:
How easily can you tell who is in a room?

This is a game about guessing the makeup of a crowd.

Play our quick game and consider your results - you may find them interesting and reflective. Your results will be shown to you at the end.  

Comparisons with other users coming soon! 

CREDITS:

This game was made as a part of Geek Girl Academy's Gender Equality Jam!

-Programmer: Jordan Cook-Irwin https://twitter.com/jordancookirwin

-Producer: Paulina Samy https://twitter.com/paulinapunlina

-Music: Justin Cavenagh https://twitter.com/composer_cav

-Bell Sound Effect - https://twitter.com/magedu

-Headshots from: thispersondoesnotexist.com/
